00001 /*
00002 **  worm_msgtype.h
00003 **
00004 **  Hard-coded definitions of common worm message types that are sacred
00005 **  (thus never-changing) in the [earth]worm system.
00006 *
00007 **  Generally, do not put any domain-specific types (i.e. seismology-
00008 **  or geomag-specific) herein.   Should use a separate file for such.
00009 */
00010 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00011 #ifndef _WORM_MSG_TYPES_H
00012 #define _WORM_MSG_TYPES_H
00013 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 
00015 #include <worm_types.h>  // WORM_MSGTYPE_ID
00016 
00017 #define TYPE_WILDCARD (WORM_MSGTYPE_ID)0
00018 
00019 #define TYPE_ERROR (WORM_MSGTYPE_ID)2
00020 
00021 #define TYPE_HEARTBEAT (WORM_MSGTYPE_ID)3
00022
